segments.text: I would like to ask for one day off next week . Do you think the manager will agree ? I know it is the busy time for our company , but I do have some important things to handle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it is hard to say . At least you need to come up with a good reason .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , it is my mother ’ s wedding . My parents divorced many years ago . Now she is ready to establish a new family . It is a special occasion . I've got to be there , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you should be there . Go find the manager and ask . I think the manager will understand and approve you a day off . Don ’ t forget to fill in the leave application form . It will be signed by the manager for approval .
segments.speaker: S2
